lexUnit.name: rear.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the back or hindmost part of something.

sentence.text: It involves fitting the rear of a standard tanker with a parallelogram linkage and then mounting a three , four or five tine injector unit to it .
It was with great difficulty that she persuaded the two dogs into the rear of the van , and they barked their protest all the way back to the surgery .
